rules.description: Shift+CapsLock toggles CapsLock
Safari: PageUp/PageDown should work as expected!
Finder: Return to open, F2 to rename, Backspace to go to previous folder
Command+Enter to send message - Apple Mail
Double Right Shift to Command+Shift+P (show command palette, possibly via Paletro)
Finder: Return to open, F2 to rename, Backspace to go to previous folder
Command+Enter to send message - Apple Mail
Double Right Shift to Command+Shift+P (show command palette, possibly via Paletro)
Space bar with both Shift keys toggles Caps Lock
Command plus both Shift keys toggles Caps Lock
Caps Lock as Control, or Escape if no other key pressed
Fn key as Insert if pressed alone on external Apple keyboard

identifiers.description: Apple Magic Keyboard with Numeric Keypad

rules.description: Windows-style cycling through applications (Alt+Tab, Shift+Alt+Tab)
Fn+Tab cycles through tabs (like Control+Tab) (and shifted to reverse)
Control+PageUp/PageDown cycles through tabs (like Control+Tab)
CUA cut and paste (on PC keyboard): Shift+Delete = Command+X, Shift+Insert = Command+V, Control+Insert = Command+C, Control+Delete = Command+C
CUA paste (on Apple Magic Keyboard): Shift+Fn = Command+V, Control+Fn = Command+C

identifiers.description: Apple Magic Keyboard with Numeric Keypad
Apple Magic Keyboard with Numeric Keypad

rules.TODO: I'd REALLY like this to not affect left and right cursor keys
rules.description: Right Option (alt) works as Control, or activates menu (Control+F2) if pressed alone and released
Option (Alt) activates menu (Control+F2) if pressed alone and released
Fn+Shift+Up/Down acts as Control+Shift+Up/Down (Atom/Sublime block selection mode)
Fn acts as Control for letter keys
Command+Shift+comma opens System Preferences
Escape+UIO,JKL emulates numeric keypad
